text: Good & Plenty is a brand of licorice candy. It was first produced by the Quaker City Chocolate & Confectionery Company of Philadelphia, Pennsylvania in 1893. The candy is a narrow cylinder of sweet black licorice, coated in a hard candy shell to form a capsule shape. The pieces are colored bright pink and white and presented in a purple box or bag. Category:Candy Category:The Hershey Company
title: Good & Plenty
